Posts.Content: I feel you. Having one of those days. Hair falling out all over the place. Getting wig tomorrow. Just wanna cry. Everyone keeps going one about how strong I am and how amazing I am being. i dont feel like it today, whatsoever. :(
Posts.Title: Feeling Down

Posts.Content: Hi,Â  I am constantly getting bites all over my body. I thought it was to do with the injections I was having when saving my eggs before chemo, but they haven't stopped. I have my second session on Friday. They are big and itchy!!! Is this a side effect others have experienced or is it just me??!!! What did people do? Thanks :)
Posts.Title: BUG BITES

Posts.Content: Day 16 after first FEC and my hair started coming out at the breakfast table.... :( Had my hair cut short a few weeks ago anyway to get used to having less hair.. Next step to shave, but it's only little amounts so far so going to hold off a few days. Still it's all a little terrifying :(
Posts.Title: Hair loss :-(
